[[=]]
+ Sol Invictus
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/sol-invictus/HotFlyBust.png style="width: 100%"]]
++ A Demonic Holiday Special
----

+++ Co-Author/Designer:
[[*User Fantem]] 

+++ Co-Author/Illustrator:
[[*User Opossumistic]]

----

⚠️ **Content warning:** This story contains mild sexual themes, a fly-based character, blasphemy, strong language, and alcohol usage.
